Oahpa!-nuõrti is not a full training course, but a set of supplementary programs for language studying. The programs have many choices and can be adapted to different knowledge levels. We have created a small introduction to each program:

ul.li: Numra – practice numbers or expressions for time or dates
Leksa – translate words, place names or person names

body.p: In addition to Oahpa!-nuõrti we are also writing a small grammar. We hope that our resources help students at a beginner's lever to train vocabulary and grammar.
Please note that our ressources are at a developmental stage and may contain errors. We work on improving them. If you have comments or criticism, feel free to contact us (oahpa@hum.uit.no).
